actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide for the use of excess assets in black lung benefit trusts for health care benefits for retired miners, and for other purposes.
short_title: Retired Coal Miners Health Benefits Act of 1991

summary.text: Retired Coal Miners Health Benefits Act of 1991 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for the use of excess assets in black lung benefit trusts for health care benefits and health insurance premiums for retired miners and their spouses and dependents.

titles.title: Retired Coal Miners Health Benefits Act of 1991
A bill to provide for the use of excess assets in black lung benefit trusts for health care benefits for retired miners, and for other purposes.
